channel.title: How do i make useitem on object spawn a npc

item.title: How do i make useitem on object spawn a npc
item.dc:creator: @Dan1337 Dan1337
item.description:
@Dan1337 wrote:

else if(useItemID == 492 && atObjectID == 1308) { deleteItem(492, getItemSlot(492), 1); sendMessage("You have awoken a Tree Spirit!"); server.npcHandler.newNPC(NPCID, XPOS, YPOS, heightLevel, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(NPCID), false); }

just change the NPCID, XPOS, and YPOS, pretty self explanatory.

Read full topic
